about_the_game:
Protect Eggs

Protect eggs and hatched birds from being caught by foxes and Eagle

The player plays a lovely squirrel and Phoenix, looking for the phoenix nest in the beautiful forest, laying eggs (press R key), driving away foxes and eagles during the incubation period of bird eggs (left and right mouse button skills), when the bird is born, it can be summoned around (Q skill)
Phoenix nest is divided into three kinds, each with different functions
The flame above the bird's head can replenish the life of the big bird
Snails on the grass can replenish the flame of birds. Be careful not to hit them too hard
Grass is a good place for birds. They can avoid eagles, but they can't escape Fox's nose

For the nest with "shield cover", after laying eggs, it will hatch into birds after waiting for a period of time, and grow up with time. When it grows to the maximum, it can attack foxes and eagles to protect other birds or eggs

Tips: laying eggs can be understood as building a system, and the hatched big birds play a role in protecting other birds, which is equivalent to a simple tower defense system

Other operations:
ESC - out of the game
Tab - hidden interface
PAUSE - Pause, Continue Game
F12 - screenshot

Protect Eggs

Protect eggs and hatched birds from being caught by foxes and Eagle

The player plays a lovely squirrel and Phoenix, looking for the phoenix nest in the beautiful forest, laying eggs (press R key), driving away foxes and eagles during the incubation period of bird eggs (left and right mouse button skills), when the bird is born, it can be summoned around (Q skill)
Phoenix nest is divided into three kinds, each with different functions
The flame above the bird's head can replenish the life of the big bird
Snails on the grass can replenish the flame of birds. Be careful not to hit them too hard
Grass is a good place for birds. They can avoid eagles, but they can't escape Fox's nose

For the nest with "shield cover", after laying eggs, it will hatch into birds after waiting for a period of time, and grow up with time. When it grows to the maximum, it can attack foxes and eagles to protect other birds or eggs

Tips: laying eggs can be understood as building a system, and the hatched big birds play a role in protecting other birds, which is equivalent to a simple tower defense system

short_description: This is a 3D cartoon leisure game, the third person perspective operation mode, the player control the Phoenix to find the nest, start laying eggs, protect eggs and hatched birds, drive away foxes and eagles. The game includes simple RPG, ACT, construction, tower defense and other factors.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Danish*, Ukrainian*, Russian*, Bulgarian*, Hungarian*, Turkish*, Greek*, Norwegian*, Czech*, Japanese*, Polish*, Thai*, Swedish*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Romanian*, Finnish*, Dutch*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Spanish - Latin America*, Vietnamese*, Arabic*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
